archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1016
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to target customer based on location e.g. offers near you

properties.value: [CLM] Depending on the solution CLM can keep geo coordinates on offers so that mobile app can place those on map using geofence, or separate Localisation Based Services COmarch module can be implemented to used Beacons in order to trigger offers inside buildings, activate those based on proximity etc.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
